page.title: 15Health in Uzmaston area
page.content: Personal health of residents is the responsibility of the{Pembrokeshire {Health Authority,}whose Headquarters is on St.Thomas Green. Haverfordwest. In that town there are 12 {General {Practitioners}in two group practices. The main Health Authority {Hospital}, Withybush General, is 2 miles from Uzmaston, and together with other smaller Hospitals and units within the County, there are {484 beds}available. for Geriatrics,General Medicine,Chest, Continued Care, Paediatric, Mental Handicap, Obstetrics, Gynaecology, Trauma, Orthopaedic, and General Surgery. Weekly{out-patient clinics} are held at Withybush Hospital. The {Ambulance service}is controlled from Haverfordwest and during 1984 covered 110112 miles on emergencies and 127547 m. on non emergencies, this included helicopter, car and rail.
